paragraphs.text: When I was a kid I wanted to become an inventor, then a writer, then a programmer and then a musician. These things all have one thing in common, creation. Fascinated by technology and science, I got interested in programming as a way of digital creation. As a music and art enthousiast, playing guitar has opened me up to the creation of sound. The goal of this website is to give an overview of these two worlds and how I combine them.
